alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 6:53PM MST until December 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cascade County below 5000ft, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing and drifting snow Wednesday may significantly reduce visibility and cause partial lane blockages.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap
